snippet.title: FIFA 18 | The Journey: Hunter Returns | Official Story Trailer
snippet.description:
Join Alex Hunter in The Journey: Hunter Returns as he goes global in his biggest season yet, and meets a cast of stars along the way including Cristiano Ronaldo, Antoine Griezmann, Dele Alli, Thomas Müller, Thierry Henry, and NBA star James Harden. FC Bayern, Atlético Madrid, and Paris Saint-Germain all want football's hottest prospect on their side - where will you take Hunter next? 

Pre-Order the Ronaldo Edition and get 3 Days Early Access: http://smarturl.it/bjrlsj 

Powered by Frostbite, FIFA 18 blurs the line between the virtual and real worlds, bringing to life the heroes, teams, and atmospheres of The World’s Game. FIFA 18 is available September 29, 2017. 

"The Drum"
Performed by The Seige 

Subscribe to see more official FIFA 18 trailers: http://bit.ly/pzw4VD
